sections.title: 145+ Features Across the Platform
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive capabilities for operators, tourists, and platform management

features.title: Discovery & Booking System
items: Mood-Based Discovery (Adventure, Relax, Culture, Ocean, Romance, Family)

features.title: Payment & Payout System
items: Multiple Payment Methods (Cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Alipay, WeChat Pay)

features.title: Multi-Language Accessibility
items: 8+ Language Interface (EN, FR, ES, DE, IT, JA, ZH, Tahitian)

features.title: Learn Hub (Educational Content)
items: Island Guides (Tahiti, Bora Bora, Moorea, Huahine, 118 islands)

features.title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
items: Installable on Any Device (iOS, Android, Desktop)
No App Store Needed (save fees, reduce friction)

sections.title: Core Workflows
sections.subtitle: Visual step-by-step guides to platform processes

steps.title: Visit vai.studio â†’ Click 'Become Operator'
steps.description: Start your journey as a VAI operator

steps.title: Registration form â†’ Submit business info
Pending approval screen â†’ Admin reviews
Approval granted â†’ Welcome email + credentials
First login â†’ Onboarding tour starts
Connect Payment account â†’ Payment setup
steps.description: Link Stripe or Routable for payouts

steps.title: Create first template â†’ Activity definition
Operator active â†’ Ready for bookings
steps.description: You're live and ready to receive bookings!

steps.title: Create Template
steps.description: Define activity (name, pricing, capacity, images, rules)

steps.title: Create Schedule
steps.description: Select template, set recurrence, define date range & time slots

steps.title: System Automation
steps.description: Activity instances auto-generated, availability synced, bookings enabled

steps.title: Ongoing Management
steps.description: Modify template â†’ affects future, pause/resume, add exceptions

steps.title: Customize Individual Activities
steps.description: Modify instances for special discounts, timings and more

steps.title: Tourist books activity on VAI Tickets
Decision: CONFIRM | DECLINE | NO RESPONSE (24h deadline)
If confirmed: payment captured, commission locked at 11%

phases.name: PHASE 1: DISCOVERY (Pre-Trip)
steps: Choose discovery method: Island & mood-based OR Browse
View activity details (description, pricing, operator info)

phases.name: PHASE 2: BOOKING
steps: Choose date and available time slot
Select currency (XPF, USD, EUR) and pay securely
Receive instant confirmation with booking reference

phases.name: PHASE 5: POST-ACTIVITY
steps: See total bookings and spending statistics
Discover more activities for next visit

sections.title: Problems Solved

problems.impact: 10-20% more revenue per booking for operators

Meta tags, structured data handled automatically

rows.vai: Zero costs, free tools, channel manager

advantages.title: Local Legitimacy
advantages.description: Built in French Polynesia, for French Polynesia-first, with deep institutional relationships

advantages.title: Template-First Architecture
advantages.description: Premium easy-understandable Airbnb-style system (reusable templates â†’ automated scheduling)

advantages.title: Mood-Based Discovery
advantages.description: Emotional search algorithm vs transactional keyword search

advantages.title: Channel Manager Integration
advantages.description: VAI as B2B hub (operators manage all channels from one dashboard) instead of competition

advantages.title: Cultural Preservation
advantages.description: Tahitian language support demonstrates commitment beyond profit

advantages.title: Tourism Dispersal Algorithm
advantages.description: Promotes outer islands for sustainable tourism (not profit-maximizing)

advantages.title: Zero-Cost Marketing Channel
advantages.description: Operators get free website and shareable booking pages (high value for small businesses)

sections.title: Platform Capabilities Designed to Deliver Impact
sections.subtitle: Market-Ready, Pre-Launch - Validated Through Testing

items.target: Professional web presence at zero cost
Reduce search fatigue, target 40%+ outer island bookings (vs 15% industry)
Transform booking into meaningful trip planning
10-20% more stays local, reduced economic leakage
4,500+ operators accessible, brings local businesses into digital economy
Government/Tourism Leaders data access for evidence-based policy
Mood-based algorithm, higher outer island reach
2,000+ entrepreneurs enabled, platform empowers local competition
VAI and operators pay FP taxes (vs global OTAs paying outside)
Local operators compete with global OTAs
